name: Winter's curse (WinterCurse)
description:
Winter's Curse is a COOP beat them all game. One of the players is a little girl with fire powers that can kill the ennemies and the other is her father who's job is to protect her.

A mysterious witch has locked Sir Bernhard and his daughter Princess Lea inside a Snow Globe ! And there is only one way to break the curse : Find every pieces of their coat of arms and succeed in cleaning the castle of every minion the witch has displayed around it. 

That would be easy if Bernhard could just go inside and eliminate them all with his martial skills, but a powerfull magic protects the creatures inside and only Léa has the abilities to kill these monsters with her fire magic.

So while Léa burns the ennemies with her power, Bernhard will need to protect her from the many dangers that they will face by using his trustworthy shield of fortitude.

So what are you waiting for ? Slay the monsters, explore the castle and put your banner on top of it... But be careful, sometimes the witch like to play with the snow globe.
